Sentencas: In the present work, gadolinium doped ceria (Gd0.1Ce0.9O2-delta, GDC) is prepared via sol-gel technique.
Titulo: Structural and Electrical Properties of Gd Doped CeO2 (GDC) Nanoceramics for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Applications

Sentencas: The as-prepared samples are calcined at different temperatures followed by sintering at various temperatures to obtain uniform microstructure and dense samples.
Titulo: Structural and Electrical Properties of Gd Doped CeO2 (GDC) Nanoceramics for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Applications

Sentencas: The most uniformly distributed grains with less porosity are obtained for sintered samples at 1450 degrees C for 6 h with an average grain size of 0.85 mu m. Single-phase cubic fluorite structure is confirmed by X-ray diffraction analysis.
Titulo: Structural and Electrical Properties of Gd Doped CeO2 (GDC) Nanoceramics for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Applications

Sentencas: Conductivity analysis reveals that GDC exhibited conductivity around 4.6 x 10(-3) S.cm(-1) at 550 degrees C.
Titulo: Structural and Electrical Properties of Gd Doped CeO2 (GDC) Nanoceramics for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Applications

Sentencas: The activation energy of 1.01 eV indicates that ions dominate the conduction, which is best for SOFC electrolytes.
Titulo: Structural and Electrical Properties of Gd Doped CeO2 (GDC) Nanoceramics for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Applications

Sentencas: This conductivity has been achieved at lower sintering temperatures (1450 degrees C) than the solid-state reaction method (1600 degrees C).
Titulo: Structural and Electrical Properties of Gd Doped CeO2 (GDC) Nanoceramics for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Applications
